option.value:
import { createRouter, createWebHistory } from 'vue-router'
import Home from '../pages/Home.vue' import Orders from '../pages/Orders.vue' import OrderDetail from '../pages/OrderDetail.vue' import Orders from '../pages/Orders.vue' import OrderDetail from '../pages/OrderDetail.vue' import Orders from '../pages/Orders.vue' import OrderDetail from '../pages/OrderDetail.vue' { path: '/orders', name: 'orders', component: Orders }, { path: '/order/:id', name: 'order-detail', component: OrderDetail, props: true }, import Orders from '../pages/Orders.vue' import OrderDetail from '../pages/OrderDetail.vue' { path: '/orders', name: 'orders', component: Orders }, { path: '/order/:id', name: 'order-detail', component: OrderDetail, props: true }, import User from '../pages/User.vue'
const router = createRouter({ history: createWebHistory(), { path: '/orders', name: 'orders', component: Orders }, { path: '/order/:id', name: 'order-detail', component: OrderDetail, props: true }, routes: [ { path: '/', name: 'home', component: Home }, { path: '/orders', name: 'orders', component: Orders }, { path: '/order/:id', name: 'order-detail', component: OrderDetail, props: true }, { path: '/user', name: 'user', component: User }, { path: '/:pathMatch(.*)*', redirect: '/' }, ], scrollBehavior() { return { top: 0 } }, })
export default router

option.value:
import { createRouter, createWebHistory } from 'vue-router'
import Home from '../pages/Home.vue' import User from '../pages/User.vue'
const router = createRouter({ history: createWebHistory(), routes: [ { path: '/', name: 'home', component: Home }, { path: '/user', name: 'user', component: User }, { path: '/:pathMatch(.*)*', redirect: '/' }, ], scrollBehavior() { return { top: 0 } }, })
export default router
